More digitization. Less worries.

Keep control

Control your product 24/7, no matter where you are. You always have full access for your use case

Collect qualitative data

Collect the data of your product, recognize patterns and discover unknown potentials. This not only helps you to better understand your customers, but also increases your sales growth

Offer a product experience

You offer your customers the best possible product experience, thanks to app control and smart home integration with voice control

Digitization even without cloud

You have the possibility to install our product on your own server, completely without external dependencies

Certification

We bring along all necessary certifications and take care of industry-specific certifications within the scope of joint product development

Starker Partner

We assist you with your digitalisation and design it according to your requirements. Use our hardware or your own, rely on our cloud solution or host everything on your own servers, completely without third parties
